name: maya
slogan: your cloud assistance to your favourite apps

about.title: Get everyday tasks done for you
about.body: Maya learns your patterns and recommends an automated routine of tasks so that you no longer have to spend your time on repeating the same tasks and chores

about.title: Built For Voice
about.body: Find more intuitive ways to interact with the apps you use every day with voice cognition and commands, no need to write it down, just say it

about.title: Make it simpler with Quick commands
about.body: Start your day fresh by having maya read aloud your messages, remind you of the day's schedule, and start your office playlist - all with a 'good morningâ€™.

about.title: Secure Your Identity
about.body: You can use Maya speech recognition and face recognition to gain access to your favourite apps and services

about.title: Connect to other apps
about.body: Connect with your favourite apps in an intelligent way and use the power of AI to interact with them

slides.title: `Hey maya, what were the final scores of last night's game?...`
`Maya, play me something from my work playlist...`
`Maya, i'm hungry, let's order specials for dinner tonight...`
`Maya, remind me to call Mom on Sunday at 2 p.m...`
`Hey maya, can you help me let sandra know i'm on my way...`
